content: this pattern is free ***want to receive special discount codes and be the first to know about new pattern releases sign up for my newsletter here 1 *** ** instagram 2 ** ** website 3 ** ** youtube 4 ** the tiny tree socks are a quick festive knit for the sock obsessed fiber enthusiasts who want their holiday decor to reflect their knitting addiction will delight in whipping up these colorful little socks to hang on the tree or string into a garland for the mantle instructions are included for two different heels the afterthought and the traditional heel flap and gusset i ve included a tutorial for the afterthought in case you re new to this particular technique additionally a colorwork chart is included if you want to add a little flair to your tiny socks i hope you enjoy knitting these as much as i did make sure to include the hashtag **#tinytreesocks** on social media so i can see and share all your beautiful festive little socks **materials** * approximately 26 yards of fingering weight yarn *us size 1 2 25mm knitting needles * a tapestry needle for weaving in ends 1 https //shy-queen-11066 myflodesk com/ev9st9kqal 2 https //www instagram com/summer lee knits/ 3 https //www summerleedesignco com 4 https //www youtube com/channel/uceksmpjh7dggw7r4gvpmnhq/videos
